Vat Gi.name: Vat Gi
Vat Gi.description: Deity that carries the Flame. Their followers are voracious, wild and are known to lose their temper.

bonuses.devotion: For each 10 enemies defeated in combat, increase devotion by 1

Vriu Vu.name: Vri Vu
Vriu Vu.description: Deity that carries the Wind. Their followers are superficially calm, but can suddenly burst out in a momentâ€™s notice.

bonuses.devotion: Seek out the devotion sites around the world, for each one found, increase devotion by 1

Vo Sil.name: Vo Sil
Vo Sil.description: Deity that carries the Currents. Their followers go with the flow in almost every situation, but can turn into a whirl of rage in a fit.

bonuses.devotion: Drink from the waters of the 10 seas, for each one drank, increase devotion by 1

Vel Na.name: Vel Na
Vel Na.description: Deity that carries the Soil. Their followers are supportive and level-headed, thinking before acting, but do not tease them, for chaos ensues once a follower of Vel Na reaches breaking point.

bonuses.devotion: Prostate yourself upon the highest peaks of the world, for each one, increase your devotion by 1.

Vru Za.name: Vru Za
Vru Za.description: Deity that carries the Spark. Their followers are hyperactive, a little bit crazy in the head as well as a bit out of the loop. You can always be sure that a follower of Vru Za will be the first one to launch themselves into battle or delve into a dungeon.

bonuses.devotion: Be the first to defeat an enemy in combat 3 times. For each time done, increase your devotion by 1

Vi Zal.name: Vi Zal
Vi Zal.description: Deity that carries the Septima. Followers of Vi Zal are varied and cannot be simply assigned into a group, as their body, soul and mind are always in a constant shift due to the effects of Septima.

bonuses.devotion: Sacrifice Septimils in any devotion site in the world, for each sacrificed, increase devotion by 1.
bonuses.effect: Reduce the effect of Septima Corruption by 2 per level
